name: Summer prices 2017
description:
Summer mode (only in good weather)
Matrei: continuously from 25.06.2017 to 09.10.2017
Kal: from June once a week
non-stop from 25/06/2017 to 24/09/2017

itemListElement.name: Season hiking map, 6 lifts
itemListElement.description: Available from June 2017 to 24 September 2017: St. Matreier Goldried mountain railways, cable cars Kals am Grossglockner, Hochpustertaler tracks Sillian, ski Jakob iD, Mölltaler Glacier (Glacier Express and EUB) and high mountain Ankogel.

itemOffered.areaServed: St. Matreier Goldried mountain railways, cable cars Kals am Grossglockner, Hochpustertaler tracks Sillian, ski Jakob iD, Mölltaler Glacier (Glacier Express and EUB) and high mountain Ankogel.
itemOffered.description: Each one ascent and descent of 2 sections per day. Only for pedestrians without sports equipment.\r\n        All prices are in EURO and include VAT. Children born in 1999 -2011. Opening times and operating hours as posted. Errors, misprint, schedule and fare changes.
